1 pe්ramawanthayeni, dan meka numbaalata liya ewana deweni liyumaya. 2 shuddhawu anagathawakthruwarun wisin palamuwen kiyana lada wachanada numbaalage pe්rarithayan karana kotagena kiyewu swamiwu galawumkarayanange aagnyawada numbaalata mathakwena pinisa, mathak karawima karanakota gena numbaalage awankawu sith me liyum dekinma pubudukarawami. 3 anthima dawas waladi thamunge thrushna lesa hasirennawu: 4 piyawarun sathapunu pasu mawime patan ganime sita siyalu de thibunak men pawathina bawin, unwahansege eeme poronduwa kothanhidayi saradamkaramin kiyannawu kawatakam karanno paminennoyayi palamukota danaganilla. 5 maknisada dewiyanwahansege wachanaya karanakota gena puranaye patan ahasakda wathuren sambandha karana laddawu, wathura madhyayehi wu polowakda thibunu bawath, 6 ee karanakota gena ekalata thibunu lokaya jala galmata yatawi winashawu bawath owhu kamaththenma mathakanathikarathi. 7 numuth dan pawathina ahasada polowada ema wachanayen winishchayeth abhakthikayange winashayeth dawasa dakwa ithuru karanulaba ginnen dawimata thaba thibe. 8 numuth, pe්ramawanthayeni, swaminwahanseta eka dawasak awurudu dahasak menya, awurudu dahasak eka dawasak menya yana me eka karanaya mathaka nathi nokaralla. 9 pa්ramada yayi samaharun salakana hatiyata swaminwahanse thamange poronduwa gana pa්ramada nowana seka; numuth siyallanma pasuthawiliwanawata misa kisiwek winashawenawata unwahanse nokamathiwa, numbaala kerehi boho kal iwasanaseka. 10 eheth soreku men swaminwahansege dawasa paminenneya; ee dawasedi ahasa mahath ghoshawakin pahawa yanneya, maha bhuthayoda thada ushnayen nasthiwi yannoya.
